main_characters.name: Joseph
main_characters.description: Widowed NASA pilot who reluctantly becomes a farmer after the agency was closed by the government, and eventually joins the Endurance mission as the lead pilot

main_characters.name: Dr. Amelia Brand
main_characters.description: Professor Brand's daughter and NASA scientist who, aboard the Endurance mission, is responsible for conducting planet colonization

main_characters.name: Murphy
main_characters.description: Joseph's daughter, who eventually becomes a NASA scientist working under Professor Brand

main_characters.name: Donald
main_characters.description: Cooper's elderly father-in-law

main_characters.name: Professor John Brand
main_characters.description: High-ranking NASA scientist, father of Amelia, former mentor of Cooper, and director of the Lazarus and Endurance missions

main_characters.name: Thomas Anderson
main_characters.description: A computer programmer who leads a double life as the hacker Neo, chosen to lead the fight against machines.

main_characters.name: Trinity
main_characters.description: A skilled hacker and a member of the rebel group, Morpheus, who helps Neo understand the nature of reality.

main_characters.name: Morpheus
main_characters.description: The leader of the rebel group who believes Neo is The One, and helps him awaken to his true potential.

main_characters.name: Agent Smith
main_characters.description: A powerful computer program that is designed to eliminate any threat to the Matrix.

main_characters.name: Dom Cobb
main_characters.description: A skilled extractor who specializes in stealing information from people's dreams.

main_characters.name: Arthur
main_characters.description: Cobb's loyal partner and a skilled forger who creates the dream worlds.

main_characters.name: Ariadne
main_characters.description: An architect who designs the dream worlds for Cobb's team.

main_characters.name: Eames
main_characters.description: A skilled forger who specializes in impersonating people in the dream worlds.

main_characters.name: Bruce Wayne
main_characters.description: A wealthy playboy who becomes Batman, a vigilante who protects Gotham City from criminals.

main_characters.name: Harvey Dent
main_characters.description: A district attorney who becomes Two-Face, a criminal obsessed with duality and revenge.

main_characters.name: The Joker
main_characters.description: A chaotic and unpredictable criminal mastermind who plans to destroy Gotham City.

main_characters.name: Lieutenant James Gordon
main_characters.description: An honest and dedicated police officer who works with Batman to fight crime in Gotham City.

main_characters.name: Django
main_characters.description: A slave who becomes a bounty hunter and eventually sets out to rescue his wife.

main_characters.name: Dr. King Schultz
main_characters.description: A German bounty hunter who teaches Django the ways of the bounty hunter trade.

main_characters.name: Calvin Candie
main_characters.description: A wealthy and cruel plantation owner who owns Broomhill, a plantation where slaves are trained to fight.

main_characters.name: Broomhilda
main_characters.description: Django's wife, who is a slave on the plantation.
